name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:
As a Senior DevOps Engineer with 8 years of experience, I possess strong expertise in **AWS**, **Azure**, **Linux**, **Git**, **Jenkins**, and **CI/CD** methodologies, driving the deployment and automation of high-performance solutions in the healthcare and financial sectors. My solid foundation in **DevOps** practices enables me to build and manage scalable infrastructure, ensuring reliable performance and security across applications.
I utilize **Ansible**, **Chef**, and **Kubernetes** for configuration management and orchestration, effectively implementing infrastructure as code. My proficiency in **Python** enhances my capability to develop and manage automation scripts, streamline workflows, and solve complex problem scenarios.
In addition to my technical skillset, I have a comprehensive understanding of networking principles and cloud services, which allows me to optimize system performance. I am adept at leading teams and fostering effective communication, contributing to project success through collaboration and knowledge sharing. My background in full-stack development with **React**, **Node.js**, **FastAPI**, and experience with **machine learning** pipelines further enriches my toolkit for developing innovative solutions.
